column5: Great one-bedroom apartment available for business trip or pleasure in Space City Houston. Within walking distance from Hobby Airport. only 15 minutes from downtown, 15 minutes from NRG Stadium (home of SuperBowl LI) 20 minutes from Nasa Space Center, and 45 minutes from the beaches of Galveston, and 20 minutes from Houston Zoo.
column8: Great 1 bedroom apartment for SUPERBOWL LI!!!
